title: Want to downgrade my McGraw Hip 45
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Want to downgrade my McGraw Hip 45
posts.post_content: For those in the know, I only collect 40s, so I was slightly disappointed when this came back a 45.  Anyone want a slight upgrade?  Only asking $10 back in the swap...
Great card! Crack it out and resubmit?

[quote name="wazoo" post=1187916]Great card! Crack it out and resubmit?[/QUOTE]

Doesn't make sense to resubmit for a lower grade.  I'll likely end up selling it.  Damn half grades...
